select t2.n_id,t3.u_name,t1.e_id,t1.e_topic, t1.create_time,t2.have_read from t_email t1 join t_notice t2 on t1.e_id = t2.e_id join t_user t3 on t1.create_user=t3.u_id
t2.receive_man = #{noticePageRequest.userId}
and t2.have_read=#{noticePageRequest.haveRead}
and t3.u_name like concat('%',#{noticePageRequest.sendMan},'%')
and t1.create_time >= concat(#{noticePageRequest.beginDate},' 00:00:00')
and t1.create_time <= concat(#{noticePageRequest.endDate},' 23:59:59')
order by t1.create_time desc,t3.u_name
